## Overview

**Slice Type:** Progressive Enhancement
**Priority:** Medium
**Effort:** 10 hours
**Risk:** Medium
**Dependencies:** VS-01 (foundation)

Convert calculator to Progressive Web App for offline use and installability.

## User Story

```
As a user
I want to install the calculator as an app
So that I can use it offline and access it quickly
```

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Service worker implemented
- [ ] Offline functionality works
- [ ] App can be installed on devices
- [ ] Manifest file configured
- [ ] App icons provided (multiple sizes)
- [ ] Lighthouse PWA score â‰¥90
- [ ] Install prompt appears on eligible devices

## Technical Requirements

**Manifest File (manifest.json):**

```json
{
  "name": "Web Calculator",
  "short_name": "Calculator",
  "description": "A fast, accessible web calculator",
  "start_url": "/",
  "display": "standalone",
  "background_color": "#ffffff",
  "theme_color": "#2196F3",
  "icons": [
    {
      "src": "/icons/icon-72x72.png",
      "sizes": "72x72",
      "type": "image/png"
    },
    {
      "src": "/icons/icon-192x192.png",
      "sizes": "192x192",
      "type": "image/png"
    },
    {
      "src": "/icons/icon-512x512.png",
      "sizes": "512x512",
      "type": "image/png"
    }
  ]
}
```

**Service Worker (sw.js):**

- Cache static assets
- Implement cache-first strategy
- Handle offline fallback
- Version management for updates

## Implementation Checklist

- [ ] Create manifest.json
- [ ] Generate app icons (multiple sizes)
- [ ] Implement service worker
- [ ] Register service worker
- [ ] Configure caching strategy
- [ ] Test offline functionality
- [ ] Test on mobile devices
- [ ] Run Lighthouse PWA audit
- [ ] Implement install prompt
- [ ] Test installation flow
